title: Natural Sea Sponge
description:

âœ¨Â How to Use

Â 


For Skincare: Moisten with water, add your favorite cleanser or soap, and massage gently over the face and body.

For Cleaning: Dampen with water and use to cleanse surfaces, cars, or dishes â€” no harsh chemicals needed.

ðŸ’§Â How to Clean & Maintain

Â 


Every few weeks, soak your sponge in 1 cup of water with one of the following:

Â 

  • 1 tsp Baking Soda
  • 1 tbsp White Vinegar
  • A few drops of Tea Tree Oil
  • 1 tsp Hydrogen Peroxide

Â 


Rinse thoroughly and air dry completely. Do not twist or wring â€” simply squeeze gently to remove excess water.

Â 

With care, your sponge will stay soft, fresh, and beautifully functional for years.
